services.name: Teeth Cleaning
services.description: Professional dental cleaning service including thorough plaque and tartar removal, polishing, fluoride treatment, and gum health assessment. Our gentle cleaning process ensures maximum comfort while achieving optimal oral hygiene.

services.name: Root Canal Treatment
services.description: Comprehensive root canal therapy performed using advanced techniques and technology. Includes complete removal of infected pulp, thorough cleaning of root canals, medication, and permanent filling to prevent future infections.

services.name: Teeth Whitening
services.description: Professional-grade teeth whitening treatment using advanced LED technology and premium whitening agents. Includes customized treatment plan, protective measures for sensitive teeth, and post-treatment care instructions.

services.name: Dental Implants
services.description: Complete dental implant procedure including consultation, 3D imaging, surgical placement of titanium implant, custom crown creation, and final fitting. Includes follow-up care and maintenance instructions.
